parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Spack",
  "details": {
    "description": "The script utilizes Spack, a package manager for scientific software, to install HPACF group-related compilers, utilities, and software.",
    "stages": [
      "base",
      "compilers",
      "utilities",
      "software"
    ],
    "resource_requirements": {
      "slurm": {
        "job_name": "build-modules",
        "output_file": "%x.o%j",
        "time_limit": "04:00:00",
        "nodes": 1,
        "partition": "short",
        "account": "hpcapps"
      },
      "compilers": [
        "gcc",
        "intel-parallel-studio",
        "llvm"
      ],
      "dependencies": [
        "binutils",
        "bison",
        "bzip2",
        "curl",
        "git",
        "python",
        "texinfo",
        "unzip",
        "wget",
        "flex",
        "texlive"
      ],
      "environment_variables": [
        "SPACK_ROOT",
        "SPACK_DISABLE_LOCAL_CONFIG",
        "SPACK_USER_CACHE_PATH",
        "SPACK_USER_CONFIG_PATH",
        "TMPDIR"
      ],
      "manual_customizations": [
        "Edit software/compilers.yaml to point to all compilers installed in the compilers build phase",
        "Run makelocalrc for all PGI compilers",
        "Add set PREOPTIONS=-D__GCC_ATOMIC_TEST_AND_SET_TRUEVAL=1; to localrc",
        "Rename necessary module files and set defaults"
      ]
    },
    "supported_machines": [
      "eagle",
      "rhodes",
      "ellis"
    ],
    "install_location": [
      "/nopt/nrel/ecom/hpacf",
      "/opt",
      "/projects/hpacf/apps"
    ]
  }
}
```
